reporting-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: Support costs incurred for direct support of volunteers in Gambia, The, including allowances, travel, supplies and equipment. Excludes costs for training or medical support costs.

participating-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

owner-org.narrative: The federal government of the United States

description.narrative: The Gambia is a moderate majority-Muslim country that contributes troops to ongoing African Union and United Nations peacekeeping operations across Africa. U.S. foreign assistance to the Gambia promotes professionalization and good leadership within the Gambian Armed Forces.
All costs incurred for direct support of Volunteers, including allowances, travel, supplies and equipment. Excludes costs for training or medical support costs.
